amendment.description: To restore the discretionary budget for the Department of Agriculture with an offset achieved by closing corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3106 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 66.

action.text: Amendment SA 3106 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S2249, S2249-2250, S2260; text: CR S2250) To restore the discretionary budget for the Department of Agriculture with an offset achieved by closing corporate tax loopholes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3106 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 66.
